      • submitEmail

        @Deprecated
public static void submitEmail(DAO sql,
                                           java.lang.String userCode,
                                           java.lang.String language,
                                           java.lang.String application,
                                           EmailTemplateBean emailTemplateBean,
                                           EmailDataBean emailDataBean)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. 
        The method provides the submit of the email given using the email template given. It is possible to provide the language to use, if it is NULL it is used the default language.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        userCode - code of the user that creates the email sender job
        language - string that identifies the language to use, if NULL or empty it is used the default language
        application - string that identifies the application which the email refers to, mandatory
        emailTemplateBean - email template filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        emailDataBean - email data bean, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • submitEmail

        public static void submitEmail(DAO sql,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> keys,
                               java.lang.String additionalTemplateData,
                               java.lang.String userCode,
                               java.lang.String language,
                               java.lang.String country,
                               java.lang.String application,
                               java.lang.String templateName,
                               EmailDataBean emailDataBean)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        The method provides the submit of the email given using the email template name given. It is possible to provide the language to use, if it is NULL it is used the default language.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        keys - map with the name and value of the placeholders
        additionalTemplateData - string with additional data
        userCode - code of the user that creates the email sender job
        language - string that identifies the language to use, if NULL or empty it is used the default language
        country - string that identifies the country to use to get a specific language variant
        application - string that identifies the application which the email refers to, mandatory
        templateName - email template name, mandatory and defined uniquely
        emailDataBean - email data bean, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addEmail

        public static void addEmail(DAO sql,
                            java.lang.String id,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> keys,
                            java.lang.String additionalTemplateData,
                            java.lang.String fromAddress,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> toAddresses,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> toCCAddresses,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> toCCNAddresses,
                            java.lang.String emailTemplateName,
                            java.lang.String application,
                            boolean noGroup)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        The method provides to add the email to the queue. It uses the rest services
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        id - string that identifies the id of the email to send
        keys - map with the name and value of the placeholders
        additionalTemplateData - string with additional data
        fromAddress - string that identifies the address from which the email will be send
        toAddresses - List that identifies the to addresses
        toCCAddresses - List that identifies the cc addresses
        toCCNAddresses - List that identifies the ccn addresses
        emailTemplateName - email template name, mandatory and defined uniquely
        application - string that identifies the application which the email refers to, mandatory
        noGroup - boolean if noGroup is true, the email with the same emailTemplateName, toAddresses, toCCAddresses and toCCNAddresses will be replaced
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • submitEmail

        public static void submitEmail(DAO sql,
                               java.lang.String id,
                               java.lang.String languageTag)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        The method provides to submit the email that is queued. It uses the rest services
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        id - string that identifies the id of the email to send
        languageTag - string that identifies the language to use, if NULL or empty it is used the default language
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • resetEmail

        public static void resetEmail(DAO sql,
                              java.lang.String id)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        The method provides to reset the email that is queued. It uses the rest services
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        id - string that identifies the id of the email to send
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
